<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Ironblood Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6032) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 125 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Ironblood Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=6011)

**Requirements**
You are in Ironblood Stance.

</column>

---

You steel yourself, preparing to resist oncoming attacks and using your muscles to absorb the impact. You gain the benefits of your iron sweep's [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=667) trait (a +1 circumstance bonus to AC until the start of your next turn) and your resistance from Ironblood Stance increases to your Strength modifier (if it's higher) for the same duration.
name: Ironblood Surge
